Improve this resume bullet:
""Hi, I am Sergio. Food for Health® is the start-up I founded in April 2019. I have an opportunity that could change the trajectory of my company and I need your help to tap it.Our first product is Olixir®, the high polyphenol extra virgin olive oil we produce on my grandfather’s land in Sicily. Our mission is to work with nature to harness the best nutrition.From April 1st to April 14th 2024, we’ll run an IN-OUT promo at 330+ Grand Frais stores in France. The promo will be themed around Italian delicacies. Olixir®’s sales performance during the promo will be the key aspect taken into consideration by the client when deciding on integrating our product in their assortment. This project represents Olixir®’s launch in France and also the biggest growth opportunities for 2024. Needless to say, we need to rock it!We will activate the brand both in store and on digital. This job post concerns the digital marketing activaction. The draft media plan is outlined below:Non-Skippable Pre-roll campaign targeted to people living in 5km-15km radius from the 325 Grand Frais storesWe are looking for a youtube media expert that can advice us on the strategy as well as set up and run the campaign.Expected deliverables are:1) Custom YouTube Media Plan & Creative Advice2) Monitoring, Reporting, & Continuous Optimization3) Post-campaign Analysis: Understanding the impact of your campaignsTo apply: please send your CV with a quick paragraph highlighting relevant expertise and success stories on similar projectsLook forward to hear from you soon.S.Budget: $900Posted On: February 14, 2024 19:06 UTCCategory: Campaign ManagementSkills:Video Ad Campaign, Food & Beverage, YouTube Ads, YouTube Marketing, Campaign ManagementSkills: Video Ad Campaign, Food & Beverage, YouTube Ads, YouTube Marketing, Campaign Management""

Once you've got the hang of the first one, it's just a matter of switcheroo with the content.- Organic growth is the name of the game. We're not fans of the follow-unfollow hustle or any shady tactics. We want real growth, with real people who genuinely love what we do.- Find and share awesome wedding TikToks.- Know what's hot on TikTok and use it to make our account cool.- Grow our followers the real way, no tricks!We Want:Super creative people.Loves TikTok and knows all about it.Ready to work with us for a long time.Pay:Start at 75 CAD/week.We give you pictures and words to use.The more followers we get, the more you'll earn!Why Join Us?Be creative and have fun.Help us grow and your pay grows too!Might work on our other projects later.Budget: $75Posted On: February 14, 2024 19:04 UTCCategory: Content StrategySkills:Content Creation, Content Planning, TikTok Video, TikTok Marketing, Viral MarketingSkills: Content Creation, Content Planning, TikTok Video, TikTok Marketing, Viral MarketingCountry: France""

Additionally, clarifying any specific requirements or constraints can prevent misunderstandings later on.2. **The skills required for your work**: Identify the necessary skills and expertise needed to successfully complete the task or project. Some teams might prefer agile approaches like Scrum or Kanban, while others may opt for more traditional project management frameworks. ""Project Description: Enhancement of Facial Recognition and Body Kinetic Analysis System for Interactive VenuesObjective: We are seeking an experienced machine vision specialist to refine and enhance our current facial recognition and body kinetic analysis system used within interactive gaming venues. Our system is designed to provide a seamless and secure user experience by facilitating user identification and interaction through advanced machine vision technologies.Background: Our venues operate with a unique user registration and identification process. Upon registration, users provide a photograph of themselves along with their driver’s license for KYC validation. This process involves liveliness detection and a match verification between the user’s photograph and their driver’s license image, facilitated by a KYC partner. The user's facial vector representation is then stored in the cloud for subsequent identification at our venues.Current System Overview:User Identification: When a user logs in at a venue, their vector representation is transferred to the local venue's system, which supports up to 100 users concurrently. We utilize infrared (IR) cameras to overcome the challenges posed by bright overhead lighting, which cannot be modified. Our setup includes two cameras per play area, using body location data from both cameras for user positioning and facial matching.Facial Matching: We employ a two-tiered tolerance approach for facial matching:High Tolerance Matching: Used upon entry into the play area under better lighting conditions for initial identification.Low Tolerance (Stricter) Matching: Applied in smaller, more interactive sections of the play area for precise matching.Body Kinetic Analysis: The system is also tasked with collecting body kinetic data during gameplay, focusing on metrics such as shoulder and hip turn, arm position, etc., primarily for golf swing analysis.Challenges and Objectives:Enhance Body Detection and Facial Matching: Improve the accuracy and reliability of human body detection and facial matching, overcoming issues related to poor performance and inaccurate matching.Develop Golf Swing Metric Analysis: Refine and expand the system's capability to analyze body kinetic information, specifically targeting golf swing metrics.Cost and Performance Optimization: Achieve a balance between reducing hardware and software licensing costs and enhancing overall system performance, with a priority on the latter.System Requirements:Experience with IR imaging and overcoming lighting challenges in machine vision applications.Expertise in facial recognition technologies, including liveliness detection and vector representation matching.Proficiency in body kinetic analysis, with a focus on sports metrics (e.g., golf swing analysis).Ability to work with existing systems and potentially integrate or license third-party solutions to meet project objectives.Support and Collaboration: We are committed to providing necessary resources, including sample images and videos, to facilitate the development process. We encourage open communication and inquiry to ensure a comprehensive understanding of our system and objectives.Hourly Range: $30.00-$110.00Posted On: February 17, 2024 22:59 UTCCategory: Machine LearningSkills:Computer VisionSkills: Computer VisionCountry: United States""
